alert.note: Alert for Garfield; Kingfisher (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 31 at 5:42PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Kingfisher and western Garfield Counties through 615 PM CDT... At 542 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 4 miles southeast of Hillsdale to 4 miles southwest of Fairmont to 7 miles east of Hennessey. Movement was north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Enid, Hennessey, Waukomis, Drummond, Breckenridge, Fairmont, Carrier, Vance Air Force Base, Bison, and North Enid. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
